queries.exists: SELECT 1 FROM programs WHERE name = 'Cursor' AND publisher = 'Anysphere';

refs.772b6c14:
# Uninstall Cursor by PackageIdentifier (exact match)
winget uninstall --id Anysphere.Cursor -e
Exit $LASTEXITCODE
refs.c829a2f1:
# Install Cursor system-wide, silent
winget install --id Anysphere.Cursor -e --accept-source-agreements --accept-package-agreements --scope machine
Exit $LASTEXITCODE
